settings.heading: Recycled Materials
settings.text: All our packaging is 100% compostable & we use a percentage of recycled yarns in production - depending on the piece

settings.heading: Locally Sourced
settings.text: All our yarns, dies and sustainably sourced and we only dye once the final products are complete, to minimise waste water or fabric. Our factory is in the EU, in Portugal.
